mylexAgentBuild.name: mylexAgentBuild
mylexAgentBuild.description: Mylex SNMP agent build date and time string

mylexAgentVersionMajor.name: mylexAgentVersionMajor
mylexAgentVersionMajor.description: Mylex SNMP agent major version number

mylexAgentVersionMinor.description: Mylex SNMP agent minor version number (to be displayed with 2 digits)

mylexApiLastErrorMsg.name: mylexApiLastErrorMsg
mylexApiLastErrorMsg.description: Message string of last error occurred with Mylex API

mylexAdapterHostTable.name: mylexAdapterHostTable
mylexAdapterHostTable.description: Mylex adapter host information table. Only for SCSI-to-SCSI adapters (DAC960SX). Defines for each Mylex adapter to which host controller, bus and target the adapter is connected to.

mylexAdapterHostTargetId.name: mylexAdapterHostTargetId
mylexAdapterHostTargetId.description: Target ID of the Mylex SCSI-to-SCSI Adapter. Will be 0xFFFF for local adapters.

mylexAdapterHostChannelNumber.name: mylexAdapterHostChannelNumber
mylexAdapterHostChannelNumber.description: SCSI host channel number the Mylex SCSI-to-SCSI Adapter is connected to; will be 0 for local adapters.

mylexAdapterHostControllerNumber.name: mylexAdapterHostControllerNumber
mylexAdapterHostControllerNumber.description: SCSI host controller number the Mylex SCSI-to-SCSI Adapter is connected to; will be 0 for local adapters.

mylexCacheSize.name: mylexCacheSize
mylexCacheSize.description: Size of cache RAM module (kBytes); -1 if unknown

mylexSlotNumber.name: mylexSlotNumber
mylexSlotNumber.description: Slot number the adapter is in

mylexPhysicalDeviceCapacity.name: mylexPhysicalDeviceCapacity
mylexPhysicalDeviceCapacity.description: Disk capacity (MBytes; only for configured DAC disks)

mylexPhysicalDeviceStatus.description: Disk status (only for configured DAC disks)

mylexPhysicalDeviceRebuildRate.name: mylexPhysicalDeviceRebuildRate

mylexPhysicalDeviceParityErrors.name: mylexPhysicalDeviceParityErrors

mylexPhysicalDeviceDiskConfigured.name: mylexPhysicalDeviceDiskConfigured

mylexPhysicalDeviceSmartCompliant.name: mylexPhysicalDeviceSmartCompliant
mylexPhysicalDeviceSmartCompliant.description: Is this device SMART (Self Monitoring Analysis and Reporting Technology) compliant? If SMART information cannot be obtained, false(2) must be reported.

mylexPhysicalDeviceSmartMonitoring.name: mylexPhysicalDeviceSmartMonitoring
mylexPhysicalDeviceSmartMonitoring.description: In write mode, only enable and disable are allowed. An error will be reported if you try to enable a non Smart compliant device. In read mode, not-available(3) is returned if the device is not Smart compliant. Disable will be reported, if one option or more has changed after the initial configuration of the agent.

mylexPhysicalDeviceSmartStatus.name: mylexPhysicalDeviceSmartStatus
mylexPhysicalDeviceSmartStatus.description: If not SmartCompliant or SmartMonitoring disabled, not-available(3) must be reported.

mylexLogicalInfoSize.name: mylexLogicalInfoSize
mylexLogicalInfoSize.description: Actual size of drive at RAID level (MBytes)
